ComicInfo.Summary:
Is hell on Earth in Mexico. Dara confronts Knossos personal army but when her friends were in danger, she ran to help them, dropping her sword by mistake. In that battle, in order to save a defenseless Dara, Justin killed one of those men and it's questioning his role in Dara's quest.
But things are not so good for Knossos either. When he found out that Dara was near him and dropped her sword, the idea of finally killing her was so near he could taste it. But who really found the Sword was Victor, the most loyal of Knossos men, and now Knossos will had to kill Victor if he wans to recover the Sword.
